trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown to communicate errors to the client when the client connects to non-.NET Framework applications that cannot throw exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 向用戶端傳達錯誤的例外狀況，當用戶端連接至無法擲回例外狀況的非 .NET Framework 應用程式時，就會擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_SERVER, which has the value 0x8013150E.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_SERVER，0x8013150E 的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> 使用預設的<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>支援參考相等的實作。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>，請參閱<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException" /> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設屬性，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> inherits from the <xref:System.SystemException> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> 繼承自<xref:System.SystemException>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> class:
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>類別：

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The empty string ("")
trans-unit.target: 空字串 ("")

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception
trans-unit.target: 描述該例外狀況的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException" /> class with a specified message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> inherits from the <xref:System.SystemException> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> 繼承自<xref:System.SystemException>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> class:
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>類別：

trans-unit.source: Property Type
trans-unit.target: 屬性類型

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: 條件

trans-unit.source: The `message` string
trans-unit.target: `message`字串

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>InnerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>InnerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> class:
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>類別：

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考

trans-unit.source: The error message string
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串
